auth.registerSubtitle: Create an account to get started
auth.passwordMinLength: Password must be at least 8 characters
auth.accountCreated: Account created! You can now log in.

hero.title: Find Your Perfect
hero.subtitle: Stop endlessly searching. Get personal recommendations based on your interests and studies with our AI-powered assistant.

benefits.title: Why Avans Keuze Kompas?
benefits.subtitle: We make finding your ideal elective module simple and personalized.

ai.title: AI-Powered Recommendations
ai.description: Our smart algorithm analyzes your interests and matches them with the best modules.

time.title: Save Time
time.description: No more scrolling through endless lists. Get targeted suggestions in seconds.

personalized.title: Personalized Results
personalized.description: Every recommendation is tailored to your unique preferences and study path.

howItWorks.title: How It Works
howItWorks.subtitle: Three simple steps to find your perfect module

step1.title: Share Your Interests
step1.description: Tell us what you're passionate about and what you want to learn.

step2.title: Set Your Preferences
step2.description: Choose your location, difficulty level, and other filters.

step3.title: Get Recommendations
step3.description: Our AI finds the best matching modules for you.

wizard.introText: Answer a few questions and let our AI find the ideal elective modules for you.
wizard.step1Subtitle: Tell us what interests you. The more specific, the better the recommendations!
wizard.interestsPlaceholder: I love programming, working with data, and want to learn more about AI and machine learning...
wizard.step2Subtitle: Where would you like to take your module?
wizard.step3Subtitle: Fine-tune your search with these filters.
wizard.resultsSubtitle: Based on your preferences, we found these modules for you.
wizard.noResults: No modules found matching your criteria. Try adjusting your filters.

profile.title: Profile
profile.noPreferences: You haven't set any preferences yet.
profile.loginPrompt: Log in to view your profile and see your saved modules.

browse.title: Browse Elective Modules
browse.subtitle: Explore and filter all available elective modules.
browse.takeAITest: Take our AI recommendation test and discover which modules suit you best.

faq.title: Frequently Asked Questions
faq.subtitle: Find answers to common questions. Can't find what you're looking for? Contact us.
faq.teamReady: Our team is ready to help you with all your questions about the elective module selection process and how this tool works.
